summary:
The UEFA European Championship, or Euro, is a major football tournament held every four years (except in 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic). It features national teams from across Europe competing to be continental champions. The tournament is very popular, second only to the FIFA World Cup in viewership.

Teams must qualify for the tournament, except for the host nation(s). The winners get to lift the trophy and earn the title of European champions. Spain is the most successful team, having won the tournament four times. The latest edition in 2024 was hosted by Germany, where Spain claimed their fourth title.
title: UEFA European Championship
